persona_goal: Handle nonclinical admin tasks like gift cards and feedback.

transcript.content: Can I buy a gift card for my friend?
We do offer gift cards at Luxury Med Spa! They make a wonderful gift for any occasion. Would you like me to share details on how to purchase one or help you with that now?
Yes, please! How can I buy one and can I choose the amount?

We do offer gift cards that make a wonderful treat for a friend! You can choose the amount you want, usually starting from $50 up to any value you prefer. 

I can help you with the purchase process or send you a link to buy online—whichever you prefer. Would you like me to guide you through it now?
A link to buy online would be great, thanks!
We don’t have an online gift card purchase link, but I can help you arrange one here. You can choose any amount you’d like. Would you like me to assist with that now?
